CustomField.description: The government-issued ID number of the account representative, as appropriate for the representative's country (e.g., a Social Security Number in the U.S. or a Social Insurance Number in Canada)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The government-issued ID number of the account representative, as appropriate for the representative's country (e.g., a Social Security Number in the U.S. or a Social Insurance Number in Canada)
CustomField.label: Personal ID Number
